snippet: Willie Wood took advantage of Bill Glasson’s back-nine collapse to win the inaugural Hawaii Championship for his second Champions Tour victory in the last three events.
abstract: Willie Wood wins the inaugural Hawaii Championship golf tournament.
lead_paragraph: Willie Wood took advantage of Bill Glasson’s back-nine collapse to win the inaugural Hawaii Championship for his second Champions Tour victory in the last three events.

headline.main: Wood Wins Again on Champions Tour
headline.print_headline: Wood Wins Again on Champions Tour
